15 tf::Vector3 Spiralplanner::get_position(ros::Duration time)
16 {
17  double t=time.toSec();
18  tf::Vector3 pos(sin(this->plan.omega*t)*(this->plan.r_offset+this->plan.r_growth*this->plan.omega*t),
19  -cos(this->plan.omega*t)*(this->plan.r_offset+this->plan.r_growth*this->plan.omega*t),
20  0);
21  return pos;
22 
23 }
24 
25 tf::Quaternion Spiralplanner::get_orientation(ros::Duration time)
26 {
27  return tf::createQuaternionFromYaw(this->plan.omega*time.toSec());
28 }
29 
30 tf::Vector3 Spiralplanner::get_velocity(ros::Duration time)
31 {
32  double t=time.toSec();
33  tf::Vector3 vel(cos(this->plan.omega*t)*(this->plan.r_offset+this->plan.r_growth*this->plan.omega*t)+sin(this->plan.omega*t)*this->plan.r_growth*this->plan.omega,
34  sin(this->plan.omega*t)*(this->plan.r_offset+this->plan.r_growth*this->plan.omega*t)-cos(this->plan.omega*t)*this->plan.r_growth*this->plan.omega,
35  0.0);
36  return vel;
37 }

39  {
40  return tf::Vector3();
41  }

43 double Spiralplanner::get_angular_velocity(ros::Duration time)

48 void Spiralplanner::loadChild()
49 {
50  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
51  try{
52  priv.getParam(PARAM_ITERATION,this->iterations);
53  priv.getParam(PARAM_GROWTH,this->plan.r_growth);
54  priv.getParam(PARAM_OMEGA,this->plan.omega);
55  priv.getParam(PARAM_R0,this->plan.r_offset);
56  ROS_INFO("Loaded %s : R_OFfset: %f r_growth %f Omega: %f",
57  ros::this_node::getName().c_str(),
58  this->plan.r_offset,
59  this->plan.r_growth,
60  this->plan.omega);
61  }
62  catch(...)
63  {
64  ROS_INFO("Error due loading paramter of: %s",ros::this_node::getName().c_str());
65  }
66 }
67 
68 void Spiralplanner::check_period(ros::Duration time)
69 {
70  if(this->plan.omega*time.toSec()>2*M_PI)
71  {
72  this->iterations_counter++;
73  }
74 }
